item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德将为散户投资者提供私募股权投资产品
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）计划推出一款专为富人量身定制的私募股权产品，以进一步拓展零售财富业务。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management plans to launch a private equity product tailored to rich individuals as the firm expands further into retail wealth.】

item.title: 中国将于年底前就毛时代非洲铁路特许权达成协议
item.description: 据负责该铁路线的机构称，一家中国国有企业将在 2024 年底前敲定一项协议，接管一条连接赞比亚铜矿和坦桑尼亚港口的铁路的特许经营权。【原文：A Chinese state-owned company will finalize an agreement to take over the concession of a railway that links Zambia’s copper mines to a Tanzanian port by the end of 2024, according to the agency in charge of the line.】

item.title: Ally 在首席财务官表示消费者压力和业绩不佳后下跌
item.description: Ally Financial Inc. 首席财务官拉斯-哈钦森（Russ Hutchinson）强调其借款人的信用恶化加剧，并表示该汽车贷款公司可能会出现一些业绩不佳的情况，随后该公司股价下跌。【原文：Ally Financial Inc. fell after Chief Financial Officer Russ Hutchinson highlighted intensifying credit deterioration among its borrowers and said the auto-lender may experience some underperformance.】

item.title: 索尼发布速度更快的全新 PlayStation 5 Pro，售价 700 美元
item.description: 索尼集团公司将于 11 月 7 日发布其广受欢迎的视频游戏机 PlayStation 5 Pro，售价 700 美元。【原文：Sony Group Corp. will release the PlayStation 5 Pro, a new iteration of its popular video-game console, on November 7 for $700.】

item.title: 战神公司首席财务官称亚洲收购可促进公司发展
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 首席财务官 Jarrod Phillips 说，亚洲在市场发展方面比美国落后约 20 年，Ares Management Corp. 看到了在亚洲通过收购实现增长的机会。【原文：Ares Management Corp. sees opportunities to grow through acquisitions in Asia, which is about 20 years behind the US in terms of market development, Chief Financial Officer Jarrod Phillips said.】

item.title: 德雅丹集团称，劳动力紧缩意味着加拿大将无法实现住房目标
item.description: 德雅丹集团（Desjardins Group）的经济学家认为，加拿大促进建筑业发展的计划方向是正确的，但要在 2030 年之前建造数百万套新房，以恢复人们的经济承受能力，将是 "极其困难的"。【原文：Canada’s plan to boost construction goes in the right direction, but it will be “exceedingly difficult” for the country to build the millions of new houses needed to restore affordability by 2030, according to economists at Desjardins Group.】

item.title: 外国企业竞相收购英国公司，Centamin 公司获得收购要约
item.description: 由于估值低廉，英国上市公司继续成为外国竞购者的目标，这可能会加剧人们对伦敦市场萎缩的担忧。【原文：UK-listed companies continue to be targeted by foreign bidders amid cheap valuations, potentially fanning concerns about a shrinking London market.】

item.title: 苹果和谷歌的失败助长了欧盟对大型科技公司的打击
item.description: 对于苹果公司和谷歌来说，这是黑暗的一天，因为它们输掉了欧盟历史上最大的两起竞争案件。【原文：It was a dark day for Apple Inc. and Google as they lost two of the biggest competition cases in European Union history.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席执行官对实现今年交付目标持乐观态度
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）表示，他对这家欧洲飞机制造商实现今年的飞机交付目标持乐观态度，几个月前他曾因供应持续紧张而削减了这一目标。【原文：Airbus SE Chief Executive Officer Guillaume Faury said he’s optimistic the European planemaker can achieve its aircraft delivery goal for this year, after cutting the target a few months ago because of continuing supply constraints.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长认为将加大宽松力度，但不会 "大幅 "降息
item.description: 捷克央行副行长伊娃-扎姆拉齐洛娃（Eva Zamrazilova）表示，她认为没有理由停止货币宽松政策，但决策者应避免大幅降息。【原文：Czech central bank Deputy Governor Eva Zamrazilova said she sees no reason to halt monetary easing but policymakers should avoid making large interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 雀巢支付 200 万欧元罚款以了结法国矿泉水案
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestle SA）的一个部门同意支付 200 万欧元（220 万美元），以了结法国对其生产天然矿泉水的刑事指控。【原文：A unit of Nestle SA agreed to pay €2 million ($2.2 million) to settle French criminal allegations focusing on its production of natural mineral water.】

item.title: 印度寻求银行和私募股权投资公司承诺为可再生能源提供资金
item.description: 印度已寻求投资者承诺开发可再生能源项目，帮助该国实现到本十年末将清洁发电能力提高一倍以上的目标。【原文：India has sought commitments from investors to develop renewable projects and help the nation reach its target of more than doubling its clean power capacity by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚比索因对更大幅度降息的押注上升而下滑
item.description: 哥伦比亚比索暴跌，连续第二天领跌新兴市场，原因是通胀率低于预期巩固了对加快降息的押注，削弱了该货币对套息交易者的吸引力。【原文：The Colombian peso slumped, leading losses in emerging markets for a second day after lower-than-expected inflation solidified bets for faster interest rate cuts, dimming the currency’s appeal for carry traders.】

item.title: 平托称分析师过于乐观，摩根大通股价下滑
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.总裁丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto）表示，分析师对明年的支出和净利息收入预测过于乐观，导致该公司股价下跌达 4.8%。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. President Daniel Pinto said analysts are being too optimistic in projecting next year’s expenses and net interest income, sending the shares down as much as 4.8%.】

item.title: 墨西哥启动 15 亿美元债券销售以收购伊比利亚电力公司
item.description: 墨西哥正在启动一项 15 亿美元的债券销售，以偿还其从西班牙伊贝尔德罗拉公司（Iberdrola SA）购买发电厂的费用。【原文：Mexico is kicking off a $1.5 billion bond sale to pay off its purchase of power plants from Spain’s Iberdrola SA.】

item.title: 阿波罗每月向富人销售 10 亿美元的产品
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.联席总裁斯科特-克莱因曼（Scott Kleinman）表示，随着这家另类资产管理公司扩大面向富裕人士的产品范围，该公司每月销售约 10 亿美元的所谓半流质产品。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Co-President Scott Kleinman said the firm is selling about $1 billion a month across its so-called semi-liquid products as the alternative asset manager expands its offerings for wealthy individuals.】

item.title: Moleskine 所有者 D'Ieteren 的控股家族重整集团股权
item.description: 比利时控股公司 D'Ieteren 集团的股价在其控股家族的一名成员开始出售其股份后暴跌，该公司表示将向股东支付近 40 亿欧元（44 亿美元）的特别股息，其中大部分资金是借来的。【原文：Shares of Belgian holding company D’Ieteren Group slumped after a member of its controlling family began selling its stake and the company said it would pay almost €4 billion ($4.4 billion) in a special dividend to shareholders using mostly borrowed money.】

item.title: S&P公司称莫桑比克 "巨额 "债务偿还风险上升
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，莫桑比克面临着越来越大的风险，因为一些大额本币债务的偿还期临近，而天然气意外之财仍然遥遥无期。【原文：Mozambique faces growing risks as some big domestic-currency debt repayments near and natural-gas windfalls remain elusive, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 布伦特原油跌破 70 美元，供应过剩忧虑加深
item.description: 布伦特期货自 2021 年 12 月以来首次跌破每桶 70 美元，在供应强劲、需求担忧和投机性抛售猖獗的刺激下，价格再次走低。【原文：Brent futures dropped below $70 a barrel for the first time since December 2021, a fresh leg lower in a price slump spurred by robust supplies, demand concerns and rampant speculative selling.】

item.title: 瑞银拥有一款能在 20 秒内扫描 30 万家公司的人工智能工具
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）开发了一种人工智能工具，帮助其向客户提供潜在的并购交易，该工具能在半分钟内分析包含 30 多万家公司的数据库。【原文：UBS Group AG has developed an artificial intelligence tool to help it offer clients potential M&A deals, able to analyze a database of over 300,000 companies in less than half a minute.】

item.title: 预算缺口扩大，肯尼亚重启侨民债券计划
item.description: 肯尼亚总理内阁秘书穆萨利亚-穆达瓦迪（Musalia Mudavadi）表示，肯尼亚正在重启针对海外公民的债券销售计划，以帮助基础设施项目筹集资金。【原文：Kenya is reviving plans for a bond sale targeted at citizens living abroad to help raise funds for infrastructure projects, according to Prime Cabinet Secretary Musalia Mudavadi.】

item.title: 有线电视运营商 WideOpenWest 与贷款人洽谈新资金事宜
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，WideOpenWest 公司正在与一些贷款机构商讨新的贷款方案，以增加有线电视公司的现金流。【原文：WideOpenWest Inc. is holding discussions with some lenders for a new loan that would give the cable company a cash boost, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 好莱坞业主哈德逊太平洋地产公司暂停分红
item.description: 哈德逊太平洋地产公司（Hudson Pacific Properties Inc.【原文：Hudson Pacific Properties Inc., a major landlord for the movie and television industry, is suspending its dividend amid slower demand for studio space.】

item.title: 根斯勒称更好的危机披露有助于避免恐慌
item.description: 美国最高证券监管机构表示，全球大型金融机构需要做好更充分的准备，告诉公众它们将如何处理危机，这样，一旦危机真的发生，债权人、投资者、客户和交易对手方逃离的可能性就会降低。【原文：Large global financial institutions need to be better prepared to tell the public how they’ll handle a crisis so that creditors, investors, customers and counterparties will be less likely to flee if one actually occurs, according to the top US securities regulator.】

item.title: Oneok 将出售债券帮助支付 EnLink 和中游股份的费用
item.description: Oneok Inc. 计划在本周二出售投资级债券，而在此之前不到两周，这家管道公司表示将收购一家竞争对手和另一家公司的控股权，交易总价值达 59 亿美元。【原文：Oneok Inc. is planning to sell investment-grade bonds on Tuesday, less than two weeks after the pipeline company said it was buying a competitor and a controlling stake in a different company in transactions valued at a combined $5.9 billion.】

item.title: 大麻公司卖啤酒比卖大麻更赚钱
item.description: 事实证明，Tilray Brands Inc. 对合法大麻的豪赌过于乐观，它现在只能依赖于它曾经想要颠覆的酒类市场。【原文：Tilray Brands Inc.’s big bet on legal cannabis is proving so overoptimistic it is now relying on the alcohol market it once aimed to disrupt.】

item.title: 南非新债券在每周拍卖会上吸引五倍需求
item.description: 南非通过出售新债券筹集了 11 亿美元，在每周一次的拍卖会上，对这些债券的需求十分旺盛。【原文：South Africa raised $1.1 billion from a sale of new bonds, which saw strong demand at its weekly auction.】

item.title: 印度曼尼普尔暴力事件后互联网被封锁五天
item.description: 印度东北部边境的曼尼普尔邦在种族暴力事件造成数人死亡的情况下，对互联网服务实施了为期五天的禁令，以防止错误信息的传播。【原文：India’s northeastern border state of Manipur imposed a ban on internet services for five days to prevent the spread of misinformation amid ethnic violence that has claimed several lives.】

item.title: Petroperu 董事会辞职，流动资金持续紧张
item.description: 濒临破产的国有企业秘鲁石油公司（Petroleos del Peru）董事会周二提交了辞呈。【原文：The board of ailing state-owned company Petroleos del Peru submitted its resignation on Tuesday.】

item.title: 南非国家公路需要超过 170 亿美元的修缮费用
item.description: 南非已经面临着升级港口、铁路和电力基础设施的巨额开支，还需要 3 070 亿兰特（172 亿美元）来修复和改善其庞大的国家公路系统。【原文：South Africa, which already faces a heavy bill to upgrade its port, rail and electricity infrastructure, needs 307 billion rand ($17.2 billion) to repair and improve its sprawling national road system.】
